title: Page heading — settings page
subtitle: Page subheading — describes the settings page

tabs.plugins: Tab label — per-plugin settings and storage
tabs.security: Tab label — security, permissions, and OAuth client management

general.bugPrompt: Help text — prompts user to report issues
general.reportBug: Link label — opens bug report page
general.nativeHint: Help text — explains when native notifications appear
general.notifDisabled: Info text — notifications are currently disabled

general.languageHint: Help text — explains what the language setting controls
general.noLanguageFound: Combobox empty state — no matching language
general.themeHint: Help text — explains what the theme setting controls

system.engine: Detail label — engine name (e.g. Docker, Podman)
system.runningVersion: Status text — engine is running with version. {{version}} is semver
system.stopped: Status text — engine is not running
system.notFound: Status text — no container engine detected
system.engineSoon: Info text — specific engine support coming soon. {{engine}} is engine name
system.engineFuture: Info text — alternative runtimes planned for future
system.waitingStats: Loading text — waiting for container statistics
system.resourceTotal: Help text — explains that stats are totals across all containers
system.cpuHint: Help text — explains CPU limit (0 = no limit)
system.memoryLimit: Input label — memory limit in MB
system.memoryHint: Help text — explains memory limit (empty = no limit)
system.quotasApplied: Help text — when quota changes take effect

mcp.gatewayActive: Status badge — gateway is enabled and running
mcp.gatewayDisabled: Status badge — gateway is turned off
mcp.gatewayDesc: Description text — explains what the MCP gateway does
mcp.clientSetup: Section heading — how to connect AI clients
mcp.claudeDesktop: Tab/button label — Claude Desktop client setup
mcp.claudeCode: Tab/button label — Claude Code CLI setup
mcp.desktopHint: Instruction text — how to configure Claude Desktop
mcp.codeHint: Instruction text — how to configure Claude Code via terminal command
mcp.cursorHint: Instruction text — where to put Cursor IDE MCP config
mcp.clineHint: Instruction text — where to put Cline VS Code extension MCP config
mcp.kiroHint: Instruction text — where to put Kiro IDE MCP config
mcp.toolRegistry: Section heading — list of all MCP tools
mcp.noTools: Empty state — no MCP tools registered
mcp.toolCount_other: Badge — multiple tools. {{count}} is tool count
mcp.allPermissionsGranted: Status text — all tool permissions are approved
mcp.missingPermissions: Warning text — some permissions not yet granted. {{permissions}} is comma-separated list

pluginsTab.noMatch: Empty state — filter returned no results. {{query}} is search text
pluginsTab.noConfigurable: Info text — plugin has no editable settings
pluginsTab.clearData: Button label — clear plugin storage data
pluginsTab.clearing: Button label — in-progress state while clearing data
pluginsTab.stopping: Button label — in-progress state while stopping
pluginsTab.removing: Button label — in-progress state while removing

securityTab.connectedClients: Section heading — OAuth connected clients list
securityTab.connectedClientsDesc: Description text — explains what connected clients are
securityTab.noClients: Empty state — no OAuth clients have registered
securityTab.approved: Badge label — client is fully approved (persistent access)
securityTab.requiresConsent: Badge label — client will prompt for consent on next connection
securityTab.revoke: Button label — revoke a client's access
securityTab.revokeConfirm: Dialog heading — confirm client revocation. {{clientName}} is client display name
securityTab.revokeDetail: Dialog body — explains what revocation does

extensionsTab.extensionsDesc: Description text — explains what extensions are and how they work
extensionsTab.extensionsCount_other: Summary text — multiple extensions registered. {{count}} is number
extensionsTab.addExtension: Button label — navigate to extension marketplace
extensionsTab.pluginCount_one: Badge — one plugin consuming this extension (singular)
extensionsTab.pluginCount_other: Badge — multiple plugins consuming. {{count}} is number
extensionsTab.pluginConsumers: Section heading — plugins using this extension
extensionsTab.noConsumers: Empty state — no plugins use this extension
extensionsTab.allPermsGranted: Status text — all extension permissions approved
extensionsTab.somePermsMissing: Warning text — some extension permissions not granted

updates.lastChecked: Detail text — when updates were last checked. {{time}} is formatted timestamp
updates.never: Value text — updates have never been checked
updates.updatesCount_other: Badge — multiple updates available. {{count}} is number
updates.checkNow: Button label — trigger manual update check
updates.autoCheckFrequency: Setting label — how often to auto-check
updates.autoCheckDesc: Help text — explains the auto-check setting
updates.reviewKeyChange: Button label — review a signing key change before updating
updates.updating: Button label — in-progress state while updating
updates.update: Button label — install an available update
updates.daily: Dropdown option — check once a day
updates.weekly: Dropdown option — check once a week

updateCheck.checkForUpdates: Button label — check for Nexus app updates
updateCheck.installVersion: Button label — install specific version. {{version}} is semver
updateCheck.restartToUpdate: Button label — restart app to apply update
updateCheck.latestVersion: Info text — user is on the latest version
updateCheck.version: Version display — formatted version. {{version}} is semver
updateCheck.updateChannel: Radio group label — choose between stable and nightly update channels
updateCheck.channelStable: Radio option label — stable release channel (recommended)
updateCheck.channelNightly: Radio option label — nightly pre-release builds

keyChange.securityWarning: Dialog heading — signing key changed (security concern)
keyChange.keyChangedDesc: Dialog body — explains key change risk. Contains <strong> tag. {{name}} is package name
keyChange.newVersion: Detail label — version being updated to
keyChange.understandUpdate: Button label — acknowledge risk and proceed with update

registries.title: Section heading — registry management
registries.subtitle: Section subheading — explains what registries are
registries.addRegistry: Button label — add a new registry source
registries.name: Input label — registry display name
registries.type: Input label — registry type (local or remote)
registries.localPath: Radio option label — local filesystem registry
registries.remoteUrl: Radio option label — remote HTTP registry
registries.directoryPath: Input label — filesystem path to local registry
registries.registryUrl: Input label — URL to remote index.json
registries.localHint: Help text — explains local registry format
registries.remoteHint: Help text — explains remote registry format
registries.adding: Button label — in-progress state while adding registry
registries.removeRegistry: Button tooltip — remove a registry source

auditTab.title: Card heading — audit log section
auditTab.description: Help text — explains what the audit log shows and retention period
auditTab.export: Button label — download audit entries as JSON
auditTab.category: Select label — filter by action category (plugin/extension/permission/security/settings)
auditTab.filterSubject: Input placeholder — filter audit entries by target entity ID
auditTab.noEntries: Empty state — no audit entries match the current filters
auditTab.result_all: Chip label — show all results (success + failure)
auditTab.result_success: Chip label — filter to successful operations only
auditTab.result_failure: Chip label — filter to failed operations only
auditTab.severity_all: Chip label — show all severity levels
auditTab.severity_info: Chip label — show info-level audit entries (routine operations)
auditTab.severity_warn: Chip label — show warn-level audit entries (state-changing operations)
auditTab.severity_critical: Chip label — show critical-level audit entries (security-sensitive operations)

help.pluginStatusIndicators: Section heading — explains plugin status dots
help.pluginStatusDesc: Description text — explains what the colored dots mean and viewport caching behavior
help.extensionStatusIndicators: Section heading — explains extension status dots
help.extensionStatusDesc: Description text — explains what extension indicators mean
help.tip1: Tip text — hover for sidebar menu actions
help.tip2: Tip text — sidebar remembers last state
help.tip3: Tip text — viewport caching and auto-unload behavior
help.runningLoaded: Legend label — running with UI loaded
help.runningLoadedDesc: Legend description — what this state means
help.runningUnloaded: Legend label — running but UI not loaded
help.runningUnloadedDesc: Legend description — what this state means
